Package adrenaline.model.player

Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoveAction, MoveAndGrabAction, ShootAction
    public interface Action
    Action is implemented by other classes It contains the methods to find the possible paths, the action information and the weapons needed for the actions
